thread.title: How three internships cost an American bank $15m
thread.title_full: How three internships cost an American bank $15m

author: Alan Tovey
title: How three internships cost an American bank $15m
text: Banks and Finance How three internships cost an American bank $15m Bank of New York Mellon has paid $15m to settle claims it gave three internships to relations of clients to win work Owen Wilson and Vince Vaughn starred in film The Internship, which poked fun at the highly sought after positions By Alan Tovey , Industry Editor 11:29PM BST 18 Aug 2015
